title: Fitness Center
seo_title: Fitness Center | WestHouse Hotel New York
shortdescrp: Keep up with your workout
contents:
TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THE CONVENIENT FITNESS CENTER AT OUR  NYC MIDTOWN HOTEL.

For exercise enthusiasts, keep your heart rate pumping with Park Central’s state-of-the-art fitness center, located on the third floor. Offering the best in cardiovascular, strength equipment and free weights, guests can enjoy the use of the gym 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The 7th Avenue Fitness facility is accessible. For more information, please view our Accessibility Statement.

  • Peloton Bikes with Embedded TV Screens
  • Cybex Treadmills with Embedded TV Screens
  • Cybex Stationary Bikes with Embedded TV Screens
  • Octane Elliptical with Embedded Touchscreen
  • Cybex Bravo dual adjustable pulley
  • Cybex adjust flat/incline/decline bench
  • Cybex adjustable decline bench
  • Hampton Fitness dumbbells

 

FREE AUDIO FITNESS CLASSES WITH AAPTIV

Stay fit and feel your best during your stay with fitness classes led by expert personal trainers. Aaptiv gives you thousands of audio-guided workouts for treadmill, cardio machines, running, strength training, yoga, meditation and more — all set to inspiring music by today’s top artists. It’s like having a personal trainer whenever and wherever you want one – all for free while you’re in residence. Get complimentary, unlimited access during your stay through the Aaptiv smartphone app. To learn more visit Aaptiv.com or stop by the Front Desk.
